name: Parade (Guillermo Barrasa)
description:
Parade is a cheerful puzzle game full with music! The old grummpy Ballonman hates music, but only because he never heard nothing as good as Parade can bring him. Gather all the instruments and cheer up Ballonman!

This game was made for a Game JAM in ENTI-UB, it was done in 3 days by a group of 2 programmers and 2 artists.

The theme was: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i6BKhvhSehc

Controls:

  • Left Click: Move Parade to that position
  • Q, W, E, R: Abilities
